scripts.lint: cd ./functions/src && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.inject:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node injectConfig.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=default node injectConfig.js
scripts.deploy:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node injectConfig.js && cd ./functions/src && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm run deployStart && cross-env NODE_ENV=default node injectConfig.js
scripts.lint-react: cd ./react-frontend && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.deploy:react-frontend:dev: cd ./react-frontend && npm run build && cd .. && npm run deploy:react-frontend

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run lint-react
